metadataAttributes.Title: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals DP-900 Exam Prep Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Launch Your Career in Data Science. Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build their foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Describe how to work with relational data on Azure, Describe core data concepts, Describe how to work with non-relational data on Azure, Describe an analytics workload on Azure, Microsoft Azure, Data Management, Data Storage, Data Concepts, Database (DBMS), NoSQL, SQL, Relational Data,
